nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Tales of the Rebellion

LEGO Star Wars: Tales of the Rebellion is the third LEGO Star Wars chapter book, with a focus on tales from the Rebellion against the Galactic Empire. The title was written by Ace Landers, illustrated by Ameet Studio, and released on February 23, 2016. It features an overview of the Star Wars saga and three short stories written by Ace Landers.
This humorous and action-packed book features all of your favorite heroes and villains in three all-new original stories!
